original: Theravāda Vinaya
analyzed: thera vāda vinaya

original: Mahāvibhaṅga
analyzed: mahāvibhaṅga

original: Pācittiyakaṇḍa
analyzed: pācittiyakaṇḍa

original: Surāpānavagga
analyzed: surā pāna vagga

original: 57. Nahānasikkhāpada
analyzed: nahāna sikkhāpada

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū tapode nahāyanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū tapode nahāyanti

original: Tena kho pana samayena rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro “sīsaṁ nahāyissāmī”ti tapodaṁ gantvā—
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ sīsam nahāyissāmi iti tapodam gantvā

original: “yāvāyyā nahāyantī”ti ekamantaṁ paṭimānesi. Bhikkhū yāva samandhakārā nahāyiṁsu.
analyzed: yāvāyyāḥ nahāyanti iti ekamantam paṭimānesi bhikkhū yāva samandhakārāḥ nahāyisu

original: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro vikāle sīsaṁ nahāyitvā, nagaradvāre thakite bahinagare vasitvā, kālasseva asambhinnena vilepanena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
analyzed: atha khalu rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ vikāle sīsam nahāyitvā nagara dvāre thakite bahi nagare vasitvā kālassa iva asambhinnena vilepanena yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami

original: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinnaṁ kho rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ seniyaṁ bimbisāraṁ bhagavā etadavoca—“kissa tvaṁ, mahārāja, kālasseva āgato asambhinnena vilepanenā”ti?
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnam khalu rājānam māgadham seniyam bimbisāram bhagavān etat avoca kissa tva mahā rāja kālassa iva āgataḥ asambhinnena vilepanena ati

original: Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesi.
analyzed: atha kho rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesi

original: Atha kho bhagavā rājānaṁ māgadhaṁ seniyaṁ bimbisāraṁ dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā rājānam māgadham seniyam bimbisāram dhammiyā kathāya sandassesi

original: samādapesi samuttejesi sampahaṁsesi. Atha kho rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro bhagavatā
analyzed: samādapesi samuttejesi sampahasesi atha khalu rājā māgadhaḥ seniyaḥ bimbisāraḥ bhagavatā

original: dhammiyā kathāya sandassito samādapito samuttejito sampahaṁsito uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ
analyzed: dhammiyā kathāya sandassitaḥ samādapitaḥ samuttejitaḥ sampahasitaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavanta

original: abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe bhikkhu saṅgham sannipātāpetvā bhikkhū paṭipucchi

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū rājānampi passitvā na mattaṁ jānitvā nahāyantī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhū rājānam api passitvā na mattam jānitvā nahāyanti iti

original: “Saccaṁ, bhagavā”ti.
analyzed: sat ca bhagavān ati

original: Vigarahi buddho bhagavā …pe…
analyzed: vigarahi buddhaḥ bhagavān pe

original: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā rājānampi passitvā na mattaṁ jānitvā nahāyissanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma te bhikkhave mogha purisāḥ rājānam pi passitvā na mattam jānitvā nahāyissanti

original: Netaṁ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya …pe…
analyzed: na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu orenaddha māsam nahāyeyya pācittiyanti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū uṇhasamaye pariḷāhasamaye kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti, sedagatena gattena sayanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū uṇha samaye pariḷāha samaye kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti seda gatena gattena sayanti

original: Cīvarampi senāsanampi dussati.
analyzed: cīvaram pi senāsanam pi dussati

original: Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, uṇhasamaye pariḷāhasamaye orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave uṇha samaye pariḷāha samaye orenaddha māsam nahāyitu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu orenaddha māsam nahāyeyya aññatra samayā pācittiya

original: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo pariḷāhasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
analyzed: tattha ayam samayaḥ diyaḍḍhaḥ māso sesaḥ vassānassa paṭhamaḥ māso icca ete aḍḍhateyya māsāḥ uṇha samayo pariḷāha samayaḥ ayam tattha samayaḥ ti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gilānā honti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū gilānāḥ honti

original: Gilānapucchakā bhikkhū gilāne bhikkhū etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: gilāna pucchakāḥ bhikkhū gilāne bhikkhū etat avocuḥ

original: “kaccāvuso, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyan”ti?
analyzed: kacci āvuso khamanīya kacci

original: “Pubbe mayaṁ, āvuso, orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyāma, tena no phāsu hoti;
analyzed: pubbe mayaḥ āvuso orenaddha māsam nahāyāma tena naḥ phāsu hoti

original: idāni pana ‘bhagavatā paṭikkhittan’ti kukkuccāyantā na nahāyāma, tena no na phāsu hotī”ti.
analyzed: idāni pana bhagavatā kukkuccāyantā na nahāyāma tena naḥ na phāsu hoti iti

original: Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave gilānena bhikkhunā orenaddha māsam

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu orenaddha māsam nahāyeyya aññatra samayā pācittiya

original: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
analyzed: tattha ayam samayaḥ diyaḍḍhaḥ māso sesaḥ gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamaḥ māso icca ete aḍḍhateyya māsāḥ uṇha samayaḥ pariḷāha samayaḥ gilāna samayaḥ ayam tattha samayaḥ ti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū navakammaṁ katvā kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū nava kammam katvā kukkuccāyantāḥ na nahāyanti

original: Te sedagatena gattena sayanti. Cīvarampi senāsanampi dussati.
analyzed: te seda gatena gattena sayanti cīvaram pi senāsanam pi

original: Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, kammasamaye orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave kamma samaye orenaddha māsam nahāyitu

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu orenaddha māsam nahāyeyya aññatra samayā pācittiya

original: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo, kammasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
analyzed: tattha ayam samayaḥ diyaḍḍhaḥ māso sesaḥ vassānassa paṭhamaḥ māso icca ete aḍḍhateyya māsāḥ uṇha samayaḥ pariḷāha samayaḥ gilāna samayaḥ kamma samayaḥ ayam tattha samayaḥ ti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū addhānaṁ gantvā kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū addhānam gantvā kukkuccāyantāḥ na nahāyanti

original: Te sedagatena gattena sayanti. Cīvarampi senāsanampi dussati.
analyzed: te seda gatena gattena sayanti cīvaram pi senāsanam pi

original: Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, addhānagamanasamaye orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave addhāna gamana samaye orenaddha māsam

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu orenaddha māsam nahāyeyya aññatra samayā pācittiya

original: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā
analyzed: tattha ayam samayaḥ diyaḍḍhaḥ māso sesaḥ gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamaḥ māso icca ete aḍḍhateyya māsā

original: uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo, kammasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
analyzed: uṇha samayo pariḷāha samayo gilāna samayo kamma samayo addhāna gamana samayo ayam tattha samayo ti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū ajjhokāse cīvarakammaṁ karontā sarajena vātena okiṇṇā honti. Devo ca thokaṁ thokaṁ phusāyati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ bhikkhū ajjhokāse cīvara kammam karontā sarajena vātena okiṇṇāḥ honti devo ca thokam thokam phusāyati

original: Bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti, kilinnena gattena sayanti.
analyzed: bhikkhū kukkuccāyantā na nahāyanti kilinnena gattena sayanti

original: Cīvarampi senāsanampi dussati.
analyzed: cīvaram pi senāsanam pi dussati

original: Bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
analyzed: bhagavato etam attham ārocesuṃ pe

original: anujānāmi, bhikkhave, vātavuṭṭhisamaye orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyituṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave vāta vuṭṭhi samaye orenaddha māsam

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu orenaddhamāsaṁ nahāyeyya, aññatra samayā, pācittiyaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu orenaddha māsam nahāyeyya aññatra samayā pācittiya

original: Tatthāyaṁ samayo. Diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamo māso iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā
analyzed: tattha ayam samayaḥ diyaḍḍhaḥ māso sesaḥ gimhānanti vassānassa paṭhamaḥ māso icca ete aḍḍhateyya māsā

original: uṇhasamayo, pariḷāhasamayo, gilānasamayo, kammasamayo, addhānagamanasamayo, vātavuṭṭhisamayo—ayaṁ tattha samayo”ti.
analyzed: uṇha samayo pariḷāha samayo gilāna samayo kamma samayo addhāna gamana samayo vāta vuṭṭhi samayo ayam tattha samayo ti

original: Yo panāti
analyzed: yaḥ panāti

original: yo yādiso …pe…
analyzed: yaḥ ya ādisaḥ pe

original: bhikkhūti
analyzed: bhikkhū ti

original: …pe… ayaṁ imasmiṁ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
analyzed: pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti

original: Orenaddhamāsanti
analyzed: orenaddham āsanti

original: ūnakaddhamāsaṁ.
analyzed: ūna kaddham āsa

original: Nahāyeyyāti
analyzed: nahāyeyyā iti

original: cuṇṇena vā mattikāya vā nahāyati, payoge payoge dukkaṭaṁ.
analyzed: cuṇṇena vā mattikāya vā nahāyati payoge payoge dukkaṭa

original: Nahānapariyosāne, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: nahāna pariyosāne āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Aññatra samayāti
analyzed: aññatra samayā ati

original: ṭhapetvā samayaṁ.
analyzed: samaya

original: Uṇhasamayo nāma
analyzed: uṇha samayaḥ nāma

original: diyaḍḍho māso seso gimhānaṁ.
analyzed: diyaḍḍhaḥ māsaḥ sesaḥ gimhāna

original: Pariḷāhasamayo nāma
analyzed: pariḷāha samayaḥ nāma

original: vassānassa paṭhamo māso “iccete aḍḍhateyyamāsā uṇhasamayo pariḷāhasamayo”ti nahāyitabbaṁ.
analyzed: vassānassa paṭhamaḥ māsaḥ icca ete aḍḍhateyya māsāḥ uṇha samayo pariḷāha samayo ti

original: Gilānasamayo nāma
analyzed: gilānasamayaḥ nāma

original: yassa vinā nahānena na phāsu hoti. Gilānasamayoti nahāyitabbaṁ.
analyzed: yassa vinā nahānena na phāsu hoti gilāna samayaḥ ti

original: Kammasamayo nāma
analyzed: kamma samayaḥ nāma

original: antamaso pariveṇampi sammaṭṭhaṁ hoti. “Kammasamayo”ti nahāyitabbaṁ.
analyzed: antamasaḥ pariveṇam pi sammaṭṭham hoti kamma samayo ti

original: Addhānagamanasamayo nāma
analyzed: addhāna gamana samayaḥ nāma

original: “addhayojanaṁ gacchissāmī”ti nahāyitabbaṁ, gacchantena nahāyitabbaṁ, gatena nahāyitabbaṁ.
analyzed: addha yojanam gacchissāmi iti nahāyitabba gacchantena nahāyitabba gatena

original: Vātavuṭṭhisamayo nāma
analyzed: vātavuṭṭhi samayaḥ nāma

original: bhikkhū sarajena vātena okiṇṇā honti, dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitāni kāye patitāni honti. “Vātavuṭṭhisamayo”ti nahāyitabbaṁ.
analyzed: bhikkhū sara jena vātena okiṇṇāḥ honti dve vā tīṇi vā udaka phusitāni kāye patitāni honti vāta vuṭṭhi samayaḥ ti

original: Ūnakaddhamāse ūnakasaññī, aññatra samayā, nahāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ūnaka ddha māse ūnaka saññī aññatra samayā nahāyati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Ūnakaddhamāse vematiko, aññatra samayā, nahāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ūna kaddha māse vematikaḥ aññatra samayā nahāyati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Ūnakaddhamāse atirekasaññī, aññatra samayā, nahāyati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: ūna kaddha māse atireka saññī aññatra samayā nahāyati āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Atirekaddhamāse ūnakasaññī, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: atireka addha māse ūnaka saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Atirekaddhamāse vematiko, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: atireka addha māse vematikaḥ āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: Atirekaddhamāse atirekasaññī, anāpatti.
analyzed: atirekaddha māse atireka saññī anāpatti

original: Anāpatti—
analyzed: anāpatti

original: samaye,
analyzed: samaye

original: addhamāsaṁ nahāyati,
analyzed: addha māsam nahāyati

original: atirekaddhamāsaṁ nahāyati,
analyzed: atirekaddha māsam nahāyati

original: pāraṁ gacchanto nahāyati,
analyzed: pāram gacchantaḥ nahāyati

original: sabbapaccantimesu janapadesu,
analyzed: sabba paccantimesu janapadesu

original: āpadāsu,
analyzed: āpadāsu

original: ummattakassa,
analyzed: ummattakassa

original: ādikammikassāti.
analyzed: ādikammikassa ati

original: Nahānasikkhāpadaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ sattamaṁ.
analyzed: nahāna sikkhāpadam niṭṭhitam sattama
